name: I Love Gachapon (WIP)
description:
This is a WIP for Brackeys Game Jam #2.

Instructions:
1. Click Play
2. Click knob on gacha machine
3. Click prize to claim
4. Try to collect all of the sets!
5. Click Sets to see your collected gacha
6. Sell extras to get more money for more gacha!

Features to Implement
1. Work - Going to work to keep you job and earn more money for gacha
2. Sleep - Balancing Sleep, Work, Hobbies, ect Done
3. Hunger/Food - Food/Coffee/Tea to help management of hunger and sleep
4. Story - I have storyboarded a few scenarios. I plan on having at least 6 possible endings at this point.
5. More Gacha - More sets!
6. Trophies/Medals - Get a reward for collecting the whole set
7. Sell - Selling misc items from home
8. Sound & BGM
